subLabels.text: There will be two papers, papers 1 and 2, both of which will constitute a composite paper, to be taken at one sitting
subLabels.Subject: Subject
subLabels.subject: Store Keeping

subLabels.text: Paper 1: will consist of forty multiple-choice objective questions to be answered within 50 minutes for 40 marks
subLabels.Subject: Subject
subLabels.subject: Store Keeping

subLabels.text: Paper 2: will consist of six essay questions, out of which candidates will be required to answer any four within 2 hours.  all questions will carry equal marks and the paper will carry a total of 80 marks
subLabels.Subject: Subject
subLabels.subject: Store Keeping
